songs.title: Everywhere I Go
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ho!
Yeah!
It's Drake!
Trendsetters...
Yeah!
I love this man. (Aha. Yeah)
Meant just.. just ready? cause I ain't actually goin do it till ya ready (uh)
Hoee

Verse 1
Cause i've never had a Benz-o
Nope or push me a act with the tints-o
Noizy Niggas speakin in my Window
Have a hard time luckin
I tell you second hand its a hard grind cookin
...
